title: Bitter Leaf Soup
content: A unique and flavorful soup made with bitter leaves, vegetables, and meat or fish.

title: Moi Moi
content: A savory steamed pudding made from blended beans, peppers, and spices, often served as a side dish.

title: Cassava Leaf Stew
content: A nutritious leafy green stew made with cassava leaves, vegetables, and meat or fish.

title: Palm Butter
content: A rich and flavorful traditional stew made with palm oil, vegetables, and meat or fish.

title: Kola Nut
content: A traditional nut with cultural significance, offered to guests as a sign of respect and hospitality.

title: Fufu
content: Pounded cassava or plantain formed into balls, served alongside soups and stews.

title: Palm Wine
content: A natural alcoholic beverage tapped from palm trees, enjoyed during celebrations and gatherings.

title: Jollof Rice
description: The crown jewel of West African cuisine
content: Aromatic rice cooked in tomato sauce with spices, vegetables, and meat or fish. A celebration staple.

title: Pounded Yam
content: A hearty and aromatic stew made with yam, vegetables, and meat or fish.

title: Fried Plantain
content: A crispy and flavorful snack made with plantain, spices, and oil.

title: Okra Soup
content: A thick and hearty soup made with okra, vegetables, and meat or fish.

title: Pepper Soup
content: A spicy and aromatic soup made with peppers, spices, and meat or fish.
